name: Stamina
description: Decides how much of his ability to perform a player loses during the course of the match.

name: Playmaking
description: The ability to control the ball and turn it into scoring opportunities.

name: Scoring
description: The ball is supposed to go into the net.

name: Winger
description: The ability to finish off scoring opportunities by advancing down the sides.

name: Goalkeeping
description: The ball should not make it into your own net.

name: Passing
description: Players who know how to play the decisive pass are a great help for the team's attack.

name: Defending
description: The ability to stop opponent attacks.

name: Set pieces
description: The outcome of your free kicks and penalties depends on how skilled your set pieces taker is.
